ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the Signs of the Clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: These are the verses of the perspicuous Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the verses of the Clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These are the verses of the illustrious Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are verses of the clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: These are Ayat of the Book Mubin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are the verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are the signs of the Manifest Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: These are revelations of the Scripture that maketh plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: These are the verses of the Book that makes things clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are the verses of a Book luminous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: These are the signs of the Manifest Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These are verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: These are the Verses of the manifest Book [this Quran, which was promised by Allah in the Taurat (Torah) and the Injeel (Gospel), makes things clear].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those are the verses of the clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These are the Verses of the Clarifying Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: These are the verses of the clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:2] Those, namely, these signs, are the signs of the Manifest Book, the Qur’ān (the genitive annexation [āyātu’lkitābi] conveys the [partitive] meaning of min), [the Manifest meaning] the one that manifests what is truth from what is falsehood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (These are revelations of the Scripture that maketh plain) He says: I swear by this surah, the verses of the Qur'an, which make plain the lawful and the unlawful, the commands and prohibitions.
